translations: n.酸制酵母；砂锅；大型有盖汤锅

phrs.translation: 马麦酱, 酵母酱, 大型有盖汤锅, 砂锅
砂锅鸭块, 沙锅鸭块

sentences.sentence: The taste of Marmite is comparable in some ways to soy sauce.
sentences.translation: 马麦酱的味道和酱油有点相似。

sentences.sentence: A letter from their legal and business department said: "Dear Ms Marmite Lover."
sentences.translation: 公司法律事务部在一封信中表示：“您好，马麦脱·洛弗女士。”

sentences.sentence: Lobster Benedict, Eggs Benedict, Breakfast Burgers, Egg & Marmite Soldiers, Salmon & Scrambled Eggs – more than a third of the nation (34%) have tried all these.
sentences.translation: 龙虾松饼、火腿蛋松饼、早餐汉堡、鸡蛋配面包条、鲑鱼配炒鸡蛋——超过三分之一的英国人（34%）都尝过这些。
